primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s trial begins next week. Here are my key thoughts on what it means for crypto’s future.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: Lessons For A Post-SBF World (September Issue)

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Steve Ehrlich

primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

contentList.title: Bitcoin’s BRC-20: More Sizzle Than Steak For Now (May Issue)

primaryAuthor.name: Javier Paz
primaryAuthor.shortBio: I am Director of Data and Analytics
primaryAuthor.description: I write about digital assets trends and am a leading creator of the Forbes Digital Assets tools and functionality our viewers require. I support the generation of relevant, curated investor content using a variety of digital assets data. Apart from my responsibilities as Director of Data and Analytics, I write about crypto exchanges, top digital assets, crypto funds, and active trading. I've the good (or suspect) fortune of having a Wall Street analyst background, and have written on topics related to wealth management, retail brokerage, and digital assets. I'm also a McGraw-Hill author.

publication.name: Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
publication.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes. I was recently at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the United States. Before joining Kraken I served as Chief Operating Officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

paidContent.inViewDisclaimerText: Detailed information about Forbes branded products & services: How to order, join, participate and buy.

publication.name: Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
publication.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes. I was recently at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the United States. Before joining Kraken I served as Chief Operating Officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

contentList.description: As the year comes to a close, the crypto industry is still processing the impact of FTX's collapse. However, there are reasons for optimism as we move into 2023.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: Preparing For Crypto’s Next Dawn (December Issue)

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: The Sun Never Set On The SBF Empire

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryContributorData.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

coAuthors.name: Nina Bambysheva
coAuthors.description: I cover crypto and Wall Street and oversee the Forbes Crypto Confidential newsletter as well as the annual Forbes Blockchain 50 list that features billion-dollar companies utilizing distributed ledgers. I am also a co-editor of the Forbes 30 Under 30 Finance list. Have a tip, question or comment? Contact me at @ninabambysheva on Twitter. You can also send tips to the Forbes SecureDrop.

contentList.description: The first half of August was extremely bullish for bitcoin, crypto assets and mining stocks in particular. However, investors are getting nervous as the Fed reasserts itself and the Merge draws near.

I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: Digital assets are buoyant this week despite another historic rate high at the SEC making bigger news in the crypto industry. It is possible that we are finally bouncing off of the bottom.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: Crypto’s Revolution At A Crossroad (July Issue)

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).
