I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. contentList.description: Obviously in the crypto world things have been difficult, and I’m sure that all of us were disappointed to wake up this morning to news that bitcoin had fallen below $20,000 and ether dropped under $1,000. Here are my thoughts on this week's developments.

contentList.title: Making Sense Of This Week's Crypto Crash

primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: The U.S. consumer price index (CPI), which measures the average change over time in the prices consumers pay for a basket of goods and services, is scheduled for release on Friday, at 8:30 A.M. Eastern Time. It could provide bitcoin with a jolt.
contentList.author: Omkar Godbole
contentList.title: US CPI Preview: Will Inflation Data Wake Up Bitcoin From Its Slumber?

I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

primaryAuthor.shortBio: I am Director of Data and Analytics
primaryAuthor.description: I write about digital assets trends and am a leading creator of the Forbes Digital Assets tools and functionality our viewers require. I support the generation of relevant, curated investor content using a variety of digital assets data. Apart from my responsibilities as Director of Data and Analytics, I write about crypto exchanges, top digital assets, crypto funds, and active trading. I've the good (or suspect) fortune of having a Wall Street analyst background, and have written on topics related to wealth management, retail brokerage, and digital assets. I'm also a McGraw-Hill author.

Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: Bitcoin briefly fell when the March CPI revealed record levels of inflation. However, since they came in line with analyst expectations the market recovered. Additionally, many of the altcoins in our portfolios have received mainstream seals of approval.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: Bitcoin Successfully Absorbs Record Inflation Numbers From March

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: The Russian invasion of Ukraine put a harsh spotlight on crypto as western governments feared that it could become a conduit for sanctioned parties to preserve their wealth. But crypto has proved resilient in spite of this scrutiny, a fed rate increase, and ongoing macroeconomic uncertainty.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: Crypto’s First War (March Issue)

primaryAuthor.name: Steven Ehrlich
primaryAuthor.shortBio: Director of FDA; Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor.
primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

primaryAuthor.description: I am director of research for digital assets at Forbes and editor of Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Prior to this I was at Kraken, a cryptocurrency exchange based in the U.S. Before joining Kraken I served as chief operating officer at the Wall Street Blockchain Alliance, a non-profit trade association dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies across global markets. Before joining the WSBA, I was the Lead Associate within the Emerging Technologies practice at Spitzberg Partners, a boutique corporate advisory firm that advises leading firms across industries on blockchain technology. Previously I was Vice President/Lead Strategy Analyst at Citi FinTech, where I drove strategic and new business development initiatives for Citigroup’s Global Retail and Consumer Bank business across 20 countries. I also served five years as a Senior Intelligence Analyst at Booz Allen Hamilton supporting the U.S. Department of Defense. I have a B.S. in Business Administration from the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University and a M.A. in International Affairs from Columbia University's School of International and Public Affairs. Additionally, I am a Certified Information Privacy Professional (United States, Canada, and the European Union) and a Certified Information Privacy Technologist at the International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP).

welcome-preview.subject: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.title: Welcome To Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor
welcome-preview.body:
Congratulations! By subscribing to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor you've taken a bold step towards financial success and improving your knowledge of bitcoin, crypto assets and blockchain technology.

As editor of the advisory, I'd like to personally thank you for your support and confidence in our publication. I'd also like to congratulate you on your timing as our team believes we're entering an exciting and potentially very profitable phase in the evolution and acceptance of crypto assets and blockchain technology in society.

We're now seeing increased acceptance of bitcoin and other crypto assets, such as ether, which is driving the new decentralized finance (DeFi) movement. This is a growing space where, as of this writing, more than $80 billion has been transacted in a new financial system that provides activities for borrowing, lending and earning interest on crypto assets. We're also seeing established firms like Walmart, Amazon and IBM implementing blockchain-based projects for critical business operations such as supply chain, food safety and improved record keeping.

By becoming a subscriber to the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor, you'll get access to in-depth information on topics and events not being covered by mainstream financial outlets so you can benefit as both a crypto asset and equity investor.

Each issue provides insight and comprehensive content on the activities in this space, plus interviews with the movers and shakers driving innovation and our proprietary research that drives the decision making process around our crypto asset blockchain portfolios.

I hope you enjoy the Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor. Welcome aboard!

Sincerely,

Steve Ehrlich

Editor, Forbes CryptoAsset & Blockchain Advisor

contentList.description: Crypto enthusiasts cheered Biden's Executive Order, but here is what it will take for that optimism to turn into long term gains. Additionally, a former senior defense official breaks down what investors should know about the war.
contentList.author: Steven Ehrlich
contentList.title: The Truth About Biden's Crypto Executive Order | Bitcoin Braces For A Long War
